runs.comm: a fullish ball slanting across Hafeez from over the wicket and bending back into the right-hander a touch, Hafeez moves forward and plays the ball towards mid-off
a roar from the crowd as Hafeez presses forward and threads the square drive through the gap at cover point, the ball was on a length and there was width outside off for Hafeez to use
the ball keeps a bit low as it comes back into the right-hander from a good length, Hafeez stays back and defends

he's been caught behind! The previous ball kept a bit low but this one took off sharply from short of a length! Hafeez stayed in his crease and wafted at it, there wasn't enough room outside off and the extra bounce as it slanted across him forced the edge through to Dhoni
gets behind the line of a good length ball and defends on the off side, Nehra's line and length is impeccable
a full ball wide outside off, Manzoor leans into the square drive but gets a thick edge down to third man along the ground

a huge appeal for lbw first up as Bumrah pitches on a good length and nips it into the right-hander, Manzoor was hit on the thigh as he came forward to defend so that ball would have missed the top of the stumps
oh my, Manzoor flashes at a fast ball outside off and is beaten, he was looking to flay it through covers but was beaten by the seam and bounce
the ball zips into Manzoor at pace and strikes the pad as he tries to move across and whip on the leg side, that would have missed leg stump
he leans forward and across in his crease and plays the good length ball towards mid on

once again he is hit on the back leg as he pushes forward to play the ball down the ground, Manzoor is struggling with the nip into him from outside off, Bumrah is moving the ball at pace. There was an inside edge on to the pad
Bumrah completes a maiden over! Manzoor moves forward to push the last ball towards mid on
Nehra strays down leg side, too far for Sharjeel to glance, Dhoni dives to his right to make a half-stop. Nehra thinks it brushed the pad, not sure it did
that's not short at all but Manzoor stays in his crease, opens up his stance by clearing his front foot towards leg and pulls the ball through midwicket, well-executed shot
sensational chase and dive from Jadeja saves the four! Manzoor had driven the ball firmly through cover on this fast outfield but Jadeja was up to the challenge
good length with little room outside off, Sharjeel tries to cut off the back foot but misses
that's not short again but Sharjeel manages to go back into his crease and heave the ball over square leg, Bumrah runs across the boundary from long leg and dives to save another boundary
that's wide down leg side again, is Nehra struggling to switch lines for the left and right hander?
a skiddy delivery hits the pad as Manzoor comes forward to try and turn the ball through the leg side
good length angling across the right-hander, played from the crease on the off side
again the length is not that short at all but Sharjeel pulls the ball against the angle across him to the wide long-on boundary, great timing and execution because there was little room to work with
fuller and wider outside off stump, Sharjeel lets it go, maybe he it was wide

caught at a wide first slip! Sharjeel stays in his crease and tries to cut one that bounces a bit more. That was a thick edge and it flew quickly to Rahane and he has such safe hands. Bumrah is having a ripping game so far
good length just outside off and the ball holds its line, Malik begins to push at it but then pulls his bat inside the line
short of a length with width outside off, Malik has a great square drive and he finds the gap at point with ease

oh wow, that is some delivery from Bumrah, it angled into the right-hander from over the wicket, pitched around off stump and seamed away from Malik, who was squared up in his crease and beaten on the outside edge as he tried to defend
Manzoor is caught in his crease by a good length ball that nipped into him and hit his pad off the inside edge, he was very late on the shot
plays the ball off the front foot towards extra cover, Kohli runs to his right from cover and dives full length to save the single
Manzoor charges and slogs the ball towards mid-on where Pandya misfields and lets the ball go between his legs, Malik hurries Manzoor through for two, Nehra is not happy with Pandya

a massive and prolonged appeal for caught behind and Dhoni and Nehra cannot believe he hasn't been given out! Nehra is shocked and Dhoni has his hands on his hips. Manzoor tried to move across his stumps to the off side and scoop past the keeper, there was glove on that, he's lucky to be there. The ball basses over the top of middle stump
gets behind the line of a good length ball and defends
Manzoor is struggling, he gets into a bad position to try and hit the ball, no balance at all with his front leg cleared towards the on side, and then mis-times it on the off side
strays on to the hips with a length ball and Malik glances, the ball misses the bat but goes off the thigh pad to the fine leg boundary

Bumrah jags the ball back into the right-hander from a good length, Malik is caught in the crease as he tries to defend and is hit on the pad, another massive appeal from Bumrah and it is close, might just have been missing leg
good length angling into off and middle again, Malik defends on the off side

good length on off and middle again, Malik meets it with a straight drive and hits the stumps at the bowler's end, he middled that superbly, Manzoor was a long way out of his ground but Bumrah did not get a hand on it

Kohli's run out Manzoor with a direct hit, his painful stay is over! Malik pushed the ball firmly into the covers and I'm not sure whether he called or not. What did happen was Manzoor ran a long way down the pitch before he realised Malik was not coming. He then tried to stop, skidded a little and dropped his bat in the process. Kohli picked up cleanly and hit the stumps direct at the bowler's end, even having a bat would not have saved Manzoor. Malik did begin to run and then stopped and sent Manzoor back
good length and jagging back at Malik, he tries to defend but gets an inside edge on to the pad
short ball first up and Akmal pulls his first ball to the backward square leg boundary where Yuvraj dives to save the boundary
a fuller ball angling into the right-hander, driven on the front foot to mid on
stays back and opens the face to steer the ball to third man
good length on middle stump, Malik stays in his crease, gets behind the line and defends
gets on the front foot this time and defends once again

Pakistan are crumbling here! Pandya leaps in the air and clicks his heels together like Brett Lee used to do! It was a  good length ball on a tight line outside off, Malik chased it with a big drive, trying to hit the ball through cover. There was a thick edge and Dhoni caught it easily. The umpire saw this one. Pakistan have a great pace attack but they need something to defend.

Yuvraj strikes with his first ball! This contest is becoming a no-contest! Akmal pushed forward to defend, but played down the wrong line, perhaps expecting the ball to turn. Yuvraj's delivery pitched just outside off and skidded on with the arm from around the wicket, hitting the pad plumb in front of the stumps. India are rampant.
swats the ball towards wide mid on for a single
tossed up outside off stump, driven into the covers
short ball with width outside off, Sarfraz goes back and cuts the ball past backward point to the boundary
that's in the air but there's no one to catch it at midwicket! Sarfraz tried to sweep but the ball spun away from him and got the top edge

Pakistan in utter disarray. Afridi has been run out by a long way. He chanced the second against India's best fielder and paid for it. Afridi played the ball through square leg and took a single easily enough, he wanted the second and Jadeja's throw to Dhoni was so quick and Afridi was yards out despite putting in a full length dive. Jadeja had run to his right from midwicket and his throw was flat and fast, Dhoni uprooted the stumps with his extremely quick hands
short of a length just outside off, defended on the off side
defended on the off side
steep bounce from short of a length, Sarfraz defends awkwardly
stays back to a good length ball and opens the face to steer to third man
Wahab gets a bouncer first up, he ducks in a hurry

there is so much pace and bounce in this pitch, Pandya gets one to rise sharply and nip in from short of a length, hitting Wahab on the body. Pakistan's quicks are likely to thrive when they bow, but will they get enough runs to defend?
driven through the off side for a single
stays in his crease and drives the ball from off and middle stump line towards long off
shorter length and Sarfraz pulls to deep midwicket, Pakistan have not learnt a thing, Wahab wants to come back for a second despite Jadeja getting to the ball so quickly, Sarfraz sends him back
defended on the off side
Yuvraj bowls a quicker one, skidding the ball into the right-hander, Wahab stays back and defends in a hurry
gets down low and slogs the ball with the sweep from wide outside off towards deep midwicket
a length ball outside off, Wahab hits it to third man
good length on off, Sarfraz strides forward and blocks

there must have been an inside edge on to the pad there because it was right in front of the stumps, Sarfraz had pushed forward to play on the leg side. There's confusion between the wickets again as the ball goes towards point
short of a length at the body, Wahab manages to hit it through square leg
short of a length angling into the right-hander again, pushed off the front foot on the leg side
fuller ball angling into the right-hander, played back to the bowler
Sarfraz steps out of his crease and flicks the ball off the pads through square leg
driven firmly towards long off but it does not get there because Jadeja dives to his left and saves runs
an easier stop for Jadeja to make, this one is driven straight to him

that's looks close and he's been given! Wahab tried to sweep one that angled into him and missed, that hit the pad right in front, a simple decision for the umpire to make. Pakistan seven down and sinking.
strays down leg side and concedes a wide, the ball beats Dhoni too
defended on the back foot on the off side
steps out and drives the ball towards wide long on
spins the offbreak into the right-hander, the batsman nudges on the leg side
tossed up outside off, Sami pushes forward and opens the face to steer towards backward point, they chance another risky single again, Sarfraz might have made it even if Bumrah had hit though
the carrom ball on middle stump, Sarfraz goes back and turns it towards square leg
Sami pushes haplessly at one that spins away from the right-hander and gets an outside edge, Raina dives to his left at short third man
goes back into his crease and defends on the leg side
Sarfraz is beaten on the sweep but he got some glove on it before it hit the pad
that is so delicate! Sarfraz waits deep in his crease and dabs the ball so late, from off stump, and places it fine of the man at short third man
nudged off the pads towards square leg for one
defended on the front foot
what is Sarfraz doing?! Sami pushed that straight to midwicket and Sarfraz wanted to get on strike. He was sent back early enough or there would have been another run out
defended on the front foot
shot! Sarfraz charges the spinner, moving towards the off to get closer to the ball, and then lofts it into the gap between long on and deep midwicket
nudged off the pads towards midwicket for a quick single to follow the boundary
goes back and defends the offbreak as it spins into him towards point
another offbreak, pushed towards short midwicket where the fielder fails to stop the ball cleanly
played back to the bowler from the crease
gets down on one knee and sweeps the ball behind square for a single

eight down! Poor choice of shot from Sarfraz and he knows it. Jadeja countered Sarfraz's movement outside leg to cut by skidding the ball into the right-hander from a good length. Sarfraz was cramped for room and hurried for time by the pace. He missed and the ball hit middle stump
that's a really quick ball, fired down leg side though
stays in his crease and defends towards the bowler with a straight bat
presses forward this time and defends to the bowler
a quick ball outside off, Amir tries to cut but is beaten
driven into the covers but not in the gap
the ball spins into the left-hander from outside off, Amir pushes forward to defend but gets an inside edge on to the top of his front pad

the tossed up offbreak around off and middle, Sami gets on the front foot and hoists the ball to the backward square leg boundary with a clean swing of the bat, hit it with the turn for a one-bounce four
that's so wide down leg side, the batsman didn't bother and Dhoni had no chance
driven off the front foot towards cover point
that's a dangerous shot, trying to cut the ball from a middle stump line, Amir manages to get bat on it
again he goes back and cuts the ball from middle and leg stump, he hits it into the off side and they take on Raina's throw, that was a risky run too
played back to the bowler
gets on the front foot and plays a whippy drive to long on for a single
good length outside off stump, Sami heaves across the line and misses

the short of a length ball gets big on Sami rather quickly and he has no time or space to execute the pull properly, he hits it high in the air towards deep square leg and Raina settles under the catch. Only one wicket left now.

it's all over, Pandya has taken two in three balls to end the innings and he leaps and clicks his heels again after uprooting Amir's middle stump. Amir stayed in his crease and left a gap between bat and pad as he tried to push the ball on the off side. Pandya nipped the ball back into the left-hander to pierce that gap
